thread.section_title: Safegenericpharmacy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Safegenericpharmacy | safegenericpharmacy.com
thread.title: USA

author: USA
title: USA
text: I must admit that I had some reservations when ordering a medical product from an unknown source in India. However, I felt more comfortable when this company allowed use of my MasterCard for the order. The moment I pressed the button to place the order, every step from then on progressed like clockwork. I love their use of the EMS Speed Post Tracking system. I could tract where my product was on a regular basis. It took only 19 days to reach my home safely in the USA. The generic product was very reasonably priced and of equivalent quality to the parent medication. The expiration date was 18 months away. I hope this company continues to operate for years to come so thousands of others like me can benefit from their low cost, efficient and trustworthy services.
